description: Defines a Flutter widget 'ChatListItem' representing a chat entry in a conversation list, showing avatar, name, last message, time, and unread status.

classes.name: ChatListItem
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays information about a conversation in a list item, including avatar, name, last message, timestamp, and an unread indicator.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the chat list item widget based on the 'Conversation' data.

methods.name: _formatTime
methods.description: Formats the timestamp of the last message into a human-readable string ('Xm', 'Xh', 'Xd').
